mean_cn: n. 继续，延长，延长部分，扩建物
mean_en: something that starts where something else ends and adds to or continues the first part
word_etyma: continu(e)持续 + ation名词后缀 → continuation 持续，延长
sentence: The continuation of this road seems to go all the way to the horizon.
sentence_trans: 这条公路的扩建部分看上去好像一直延伸到地平线尽头。
